item.title: Pi Network
item.description: A few days ago from this blog post, I got invited by a friend to join the Pi Network. I’ve been a cryptocurrency observer for quite some time and I have seen things come and go. I was a bit skeptical but at the same time curious of what it is. I activated Cloudflare’s FREE WARP+ on my phone so I could be sure this is not something that’s hideous. So far, EVERYTHING checks out, so I joined.
